opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Rweyemamu v. Connecticut Commission on Human Rights and Opportunities

opinion:
128 S.Ct. 206 (2007)

Justinian RWEYEMAMU, petitioner,
v.
CONNECTICUT COMMISSION ON HUMAN RIGHTS AND OPPORTUNITIES, et al.

No. 07-3.

Supreme Court of United States.

October 1, 2007.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the Appellate Court of Connecticut denied.
